"for the now" lmao

I remain a member and supporter of the GPC for the now. I also enthusiastically remain President of the legally and actually separate Green Party of Manitoba, which you should all go join if you live in MB lol.

It's worth noting, I suppose, that on Wednesday I also finally resigned from the Green Party of Canada's Federal Council (I announced my resignation in August and wanted to resign since *last* September). Best of luck to everyone still there, esp my friend @AmitaKuttner #GPC
